tweets.author: Thomas Massie
tweets.text: Regardless of how you felt about Rob Reiner, this is inappropriate and disrespectful discourse about a man who was just brutally murdered. I guess my elected GOP colleagues, the VP, and White House staff will just ignore it because they’re afraid? I challenge anyone to defend it.

thread_replies.author: Jo
thread_replies.text:
Make them “defend” it.
Every single one of them.

thread_replies.author: DB
thread_replies.text: Indefensible. If you agree that Reiner somehow had it coming because of his political beliefs, then you must also agree Charlie Kirk also had it coming, for the same reason. Can't have it both ways...

thread_replies.author: Maxwell Black
thread_replies.text: There is literally no depth of depravity to which he won't delve. He's a lost cause but are his enablers and supporters so lacking in taste and integrity that they can turn a blind eye to his despicable behavior?

thread_replies.author: The Patriot Voice
thread_replies.text: It’s the PRINCIPLE of the fact that a POTUS would make such an UGLY statement about someone who has passed.

tweets.author: Protect Kamala Harris
tweets.text:
Rob Reiner spent decades defending democracy and fighting for equality - even when it wasn’t easy or popular. At a moment when silence is safer, his willingness to speak out is a reminder that protecting democracy requires courage.

RETWEET to honor Reiner's legacy of justice

thread_replies.author: CKP
thread_replies.text: What leftist call democracy is the absolute opposite. First, America is not a democracy. It is a republic form of government. Second, they are just fine with democracy as long as it works for them. Otherwise they say it is a threat to democracy. In reality, it’s simply a threat

thread_replies.author: DDDgazinia
thread_replies.text: What a tremedous loss to our society...a voice that was true and never violent or abusive. Rest in Ipower!!!

thread_replies.author: J Scott
thread_replies.text: I may disagree with his politics, but no one deserves to be murdered because of their political beliefs. Our hearts go out the family and friends

thread_replies.author: B2011
thread_replies.text: I hope Trump reads all the wonderful things being said about Rob Reiner and realizes that no one other than the sycophants and the cult members will ever say things like that about him and mean it.

tweets.author: Canada Hates Trump
tweets.text:
At a time when silence was easier, Rob Reiner chose clarity.
His words stood for democracy, truth, and accountability, without apology.
Rest in Peace.

thread_replies.author: Claire S
thread_replies.text: This past weekend was pure heartbreak -so many tragedies.  And it always happens to the beautiful souls.....not the bad, evil ones.

thread_replies.author: Canada Hates Trump
thread_replies.text: Yes, it was a very crappy weekend.

thread_replies.author: DancingSpirit
thread_replies.text: Trump's response has made me sick to my stomach

thread_replies.author: Canada Hates Trump
thread_replies.text: Thanks for sharing this - I have responded!

tweets.author: Protect Kamala Harris
tweets.text:
Donald Trump’s vile attack on Rob Reiner hours after his death proves that everything Reiner said about Trump was 100 percent true.

Rob Reiner will go down in history as a patriot. Trump will go down as a fraud.

thread_replies.author: Protect Kamala Harris
thread_replies.text: Donald Trump’s unhinged, inhumane, and disgusting response to Rob Reiner’s death.

thread_replies.author: Protect Kamala Harris
thread_replies.text: Called out those who celebrated Charlie Kirk’s death - and will do the same for Rob Reiner.

thread_replies.author: Stanley Cohen
thread_replies.text: I am not big on "patriots" but agree ... Reiner and his wife  both led remarkable lives and will be missed.

thread_replies.author: CKP
thread_replies.text: Did it remind you of how conservative felt when Charlie Kirk was attacked?

thread_replies.author: Arya Snark
thread_replies.text:
Decent human beings are used to the death by a thousand cuts these evil people deal out, but this is beyond vile even for the orange piece of shit.

If Trumpers who applaud this level of evil & hatred were worthwhile human beings they'd finally stop propping him up & revile him.

tweets.author: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene
tweets.text:
Rob Reiner and his wife were tragically killed at the hands of their own son, who reportedly had drug addiction and other issues, and their remaining children are left in serious mourning and heartbreak.

This is a family tragedy, not about politics or political enemies.

Many

thread_replies.author: FADDE
thread_replies.text: Also rob cheered the death of Charlie Kirk.

thread_replies.author: Carson
thread_replies.text: Agreeing with MTG has me all sorts of twisted.

thread_replies.author: Leo
thread_replies.text: She’s right. Two people are dead and kids are grieving. Lead with compassion, then deal with the failures that let addiction and violence spiral

thread_replies.author: Holden Culotta
thread_replies.text:
Trump, Vance, the GOP, and TPUSA just spent weeks decrying the extreme left disgustingly justifying Charlie Kirk’s assassination.

This Trump post is the same exact vile reaction those extreme leftists had to Charlie Kirk’s assassination.

If Vance, the GOP, and TPUSA don’t
